original_text: Hiram also made the pots, the shovels, and the basins. So Hiram finished all the work that he did for King Solomon on the house of the Lord:
korean_text: 히람이 또 물두멍과 부삽과 대접들을 만들었더라 이와 같이 히람이 솔로몬 왕을 위하여 여호와의 전의 모든 일을 마쳤으니

sentences.original_text: Hiram also made the pots, the shovels, and the basins.
sentences.korean_translation: 히람은 또 솥과 부삽과 대야를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: So Hiram finished all the work
that he did for King Solomon
on the house of the Lord:
